title: Ticket #63: HAD fault tolerance for transferer failure, weak
description:
When in an HA setup with 3+ central manager nodes, if the transferer fails when contacting the first backup HAD daemon it will not attempt to contact any others.

What it should do is contact them in parallel or at least log the error and continue on.

The current state of affairs means a single poorly behaving HA node can effectively cause other HA nodes to get out of sync.
